code: import UserApi from"../apis/userApi";import{ACTION_TYPE}from"./actionType";export var getLogin=function getLogin(email,password){return function(dispatch){return UserApi.login(email,password).then(function(res){var result={type:ACTION_TYPE.LOGIN,payload:res};dispatch(result);return res;});};};export var getUser=function getUser(){return function(dispatch){return UserApi.userProfile().then(function(res){var result={type:ACTION_TYPE.PROFILE,payload:res};dispatch(result);return res;});};};export var getListUser=function getListUser(){return function(dispatch){return UserApi.listUser().then(function(res){var result={type:ACTION_TYPE.LIST_USER,payload:res};dispatch(result);return res;});};};export var deleteUser=function deleteUser(id){return function(dispatch){return UserApi.deleteUser(id).then(function(res){var result={type:ACTION_TYPE.DELETE_USER,payload:id};dispatch(result);return res;});};};export var updateInfoUser=function updateInfoUser(id,email,_ref){var read=_ref.read,write=_ref.write,is_admin=_ref.is_admin;return function(dispatch){return UserApi.updateInfoUser(id,email,{read:read,write:write,is_admin:is_admin}).then(function(res){var result={type:ACTION_TYPE.UPDATE_INFO_USER,payload:res};dispatch(result);return res;});};};export var updatePassword=function updatePassword(oldPassword,newPassword){return function(dispatch){return UserApi.changePassword(oldPassword,newPassword).then(function(res){var result={type:ACTION_TYPE.CHANGE_PASSWORD,payload:res};dispatch(result);return res;});};};
